## Description
The **Rename Invoices (EI) **task allows to rename electronic invoices (XML files) based on a unique identifier.

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- In the **Filename attribute **field, enter the name of the attribute containing the temporary invoice filename (for example: *//DOCUMENT /@InvoiceName*).

> Important

The value of this field must be unique.

The names of the electronic invoice files to be processed must match the names of the elements in the **Filename attribute **field of the *driver.xml *file.

- In the **VAT attribute **field, enter the name of the attribute containing the VAT number (for example: *//DOCUMENT/@VatCode*).

## Input
- XML files (electronic invoices)

- Metadata file, that must be named *driver.xml*

> Note

Any additional input files will be copied in output as they are, without any changes.

> Tip

As a best practice, in order to avoid duplicates on DP2 and DP3, it is recommended to migrate all procedures using a specific VAT number (or Italian "Partita IVA") at the same time.

## Output
- Renamed XML files (electronic invoices), based on the following naming convention:

`VATNUMBER_INCREMENTAL.xml`where *INCREMENTAL *is a progressive number calculated uniquely for each specific VAT number.

- Updated *driver.xml *metadata file, where every occurrence of the invoice file has been renamed
